testsuite.name: au.edu.uq.smartass.question.GeomSeqSumTest
testsuite.system-out: Let $2, 6, 18$ be the first three terms of a geometric sequence. What is the sum of the first 20 terms? \begin{align*} S_n&=\dfrac{a(r^n-1)}{r-1}\text{, where }r=6\div2=3\text{ and }a=2.\\ S_{20}&=\dfrac{2(3^{20-1})}{20-1}\\ &=\dfrac{2\cdot3^{19}}{19}\\ &\approx122343312.32 \end{align*} $122343312.32$
